The Last of Us 2 represents how games sh: Been following this game for a few years\, eager to see more game play footage. On the pros side\, tlou2 has stunning beautiful graphics\, with lush tall grass to snipe baddies from that looks incredible to say the least on a 4k tv. Like the game before it the voice acting is top notch as well. Where the game falls short on sadly is the story. Its neither a 0 or a 10 which gamers seem to be on an unwinnable war on. Its more of a 5/10 or 6/10. Killing a beloved character in the way they chose to was an unfortunate mistake\, but they took a gamble. I think it was less about politics and more for shock\, but the end result leaves the game feeling like a somewhat better written story for a Death Wish movie that would have landed better if the antagonist ultimately met their demise.… Expand
